Package com.bhma.client.utility

Class SpaceMarineReader

java.lang.Object
com.bhma.client.utility.SpaceMarineReader
public class SpaceMarineReader extends Object
responsible for reading and checking values of fields in SpaceMarine

  • Method Details

    • readX

      public double readX() throws IllegalValueException, NumberFormatException
      Returns:
      entered value of x field in Coordinates if it was correct
      Throws:
      IllegalValueException - if entered value was lower than -685
      NumberFormatException - if entered value was not a number

    • readY

      public long readY() throws NumberFormatException
      Returns:
      entered value of y field in Coordinates if it was correct
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - if entered value was not a number

    • readHealth

      public Double readHealth() throws IllegalValueException, NumberFormatException
      Returns:
      entered value of health field in SpaceMarine if it was correct
      Throws:
      IllegalValueException - if entered value was lower than 0
      NumberFormatException - if entered value was not a number

    • readCategory

      public AstartesCategory readCategory() throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns:
      entered value of category field in SpaceMarine if it was correct
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if entered value isn't one of values in AstartesCategory

    • readWeaponType

      public Weapon readWeaponType() throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns:
      entered value of weaponType field in SpaceMarine if it was correct
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if entered value isn't one of values in Weapon

    • readMeleeWeapon

      public MeleeWeapon readMeleeWeapon() throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns:
      entered value of meleeWeapon field in SpaceMarine if it was correct (or null)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if entered value isn't one of values in MeleeWeapon and isn't empty

    • readNotNullString

      public String readNotNullString() throws IllegalValueException
      Returns:
      entered value if it was not empty
      Throws:
      IllegalValueException - if entered value was empty
